nodes.text: The Delmaasi pirates were a group of pirates active during the Clone Wars between the Galactic Republic and the Confederacy of Independent Systems. Like many other pirate groups, the Delmaasi pirates' capture by the Confederacy was deprioritized by the government's leader, Count Dooku. Dooku later signed terms with the Delmaasi pirates to exclusively target the Republic during the war.

The Delmaasi pirates were first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in Rise of the Separatists, a 2019 supplement to Fantasy Flight Games' series of Star Wars Roleplaying products. The pirates were originally created for the Star Wars Legends continuity, where they were mentioned in the 2012 reference book The Essential Guide to Warfare, which was written by Jason Fry and Paul R. Urquhart.
